Package katrenko.ws

Class Summary
applyCRF  
applyCRFServlet  
CollocationService  
DataToXML DataToXML is used by NERServlet to output XML
LearnModel LearnModel web service provides the following functionality: learns a model given the annotated corpus and stores it together with its log file.
LearnModelServlet Calls LearnModel web service which returns 10-fold cross-validation results on the input data and stores a model and its log file in the folder provided by a user.
NERService NERService uses LingPipe models to label the input data provided by a user.
NERServlet NERServlet is a client for NERService.
output  
Phrases  
RelationExtraction RelationExtraction class provides a functionality of extracting relation mentions given a test file and a model.
RelationExtractionServlet Client for the RelationExtraction web service.
RelationLearning RelationLearning uses a local context of the named entities (including the named entities themselves) and the background knowledge to learn a model for a binary relation detection.
Stemmer Stemmer, implementing the Porter Stemming Algorithm The Stemmer class transforms a word into its root form.
TestModel  
TestModelServlet  
trainCRF  
XMLR XMLR is used by RelationLearningServlet to output XML data
XMLRedirect  
XMLRedirectTest
